description: Main entry point for a Flutter mobile application, setting up Providers and routing for a food delivery app.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application that sets up dependency providers and navigation routes.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes environment and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, comprising a MultiProvider and MaterialApp with configured routes and theme.
